Why not pkg/apiserver/interfaces.go?

However, it seems to me that referencing apiserver here violates our layering.

I'm ok with this as an intermediate step, but we should draw a (ideally acyclic) diagram of how we want the code to be organized.

Yeah, same reasoning.  I was thinking api/rest, but it might be even more fundamental
